title: Strengthening Inquiry-Based Science Education Design Competencies: Mobile Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Scientific reasoning skills and understanding of basic research methodologies
context.additional_context: Learners needing workplace-linked scientific inquiry projects, conducted in smartphone-based, limited-technology educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can design workplace problem-solving solutions by applying the scientific inquiry process (question-hypothesis-experiment-analysis-conclusion)
Learners can analyze existing science education materials and propose enhancements to strengthen inquiry elements
Learners can create improved inquiry activity plans reflecting peer feedback using collaboration tools in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
